data.title: Arnon Milchan: Credits, Bio, News & More
data.meta_description: Searching to find out more about Arnon Milchan? We have a full Biography, Photos, Theatre Credits, TV and Movies, Videos and more! Check out Arnon Milchan's bio now including film and tv, as well as on stage.
data.text:
Arnon Milchan News

PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL Brings Its Love Story To The BJCC Concert Hall This Spring

Experience the magic of Broadway as PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL comes to the BJCC Concert Hall. Don't miss this iconic show from April 30 to May 5.

Video: Watch a New Clip of FRAGGLE ROCK Season 2 Featuring DeBose, Goldstein & More

All 13 episodes of “Fraggle Rock: Back to the Rock” season two premiered globally on Apple TV+. Watch a clip here!

Ariana DeBose, Daveed Diggs & More Set For FRAGGLE ROCK Season 2

The new season features Academy Award winner Ariana DeBose, Emmy Award winner Brett Goldstein, Emmy Award winner Catherine O’Hara, Tony and Grammy Award winner, Emmy Award nominee Daveed Diggs, Grammy nominee Adam Lambert and K-pop group aespa, and more. Watch the video trailer now!

PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL On Sale Tomorrow At Zions Bank Broadway at the Eccles

Get ready to experience the magic of Pretty Woman: The Musical! Tickets are now on sale for this captivating show. Don't miss out on the opportunity to see it live.

PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL Is Coming To Santa Barbara In January!

The American Theatre Guild will present PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL, a dazzling theatrical take on the beloved film.

PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL is Coming to Thousand Oaks in January

The American Theatre Guild will present PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL, a dazzling theatrical take on the beloved film. Learn how to purchase tickets!

MAMMA MIA!, PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL & THE CHER SHOW Are Coming To The Fisher Theatre

Broadway In Detroit announces that PRETTY WOMAN: The Musical, THE CHER SHOW and MAMMA MIA! are coming to the Fisher Theatre in 2024. Learn how to purchase tickets!

Tickets on Sale This Week for PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL at Popejoy Hall

Single tickets for the upcoming Popejoy Hall engagement of PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL in Albuquerque will go on sale Friday, November 17, 2023 at 10:00 am.

PRETTY WOMAN THE MUSICAL Makes Scottish Premiere Next Month

Following a hugely successful run in the West End, the producers of the smash hit PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL are delighted to hold the Scottish premiere at the Theatre Royal, Glasgow on Tuesday 14 November 2023.

PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL to Make Miami Premiere at The Arsht Center in December

Pretty Woman: The Musical is set to premiere in Miami at the Arsht Center on December 5. Get all the event and ticket information here!

Fall In Love All Over Again. PRETTY WOMAN The Musical Comes To Boston In February 2024

Fall in love all over again with Pretty Woman The Musical coming to Boston from Feb 27 - Mar 3, 2024. Get your tickets now for this unforgettable experience!

PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL Comes to South Bend Next Month

The American Theatre Guild will present PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL, a dazzling theatrical take on the beloved film. This production will open the 23–24 BROADWAY IN SOUTH BEND SERIES on the Morris Performing Arts Center stage November 3–5, 2023. Learn more about the musical here!

PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL to be Presented at State Theatre New Jersey This Month

Catch the Broadway hit, Pretty Woman: The Musical, at State Theatre New Jersey. Experience the beloved romantic comedy on stage and get your tickets now.

National Tour of PRETTY WOMAN The Musical Makes Wilmington Premiere in October

The Grand presents the Wilmington premiere of PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL at The Playhouse on Rodney Square for five performances only, Friday, October 13 through Sunday, October 15. Learn more about the musical and find out how to get tickets here!

PRETTY WOMAN THE MUSICAL Comes To E.J. Thomas Hall In October

PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL is coming to E.J. Thomas Performing Arts Hall on the University of Akron campus Tuesday, October 17 and Wednesday, October 18th as part of the 2023-24 Broadway in Akron series.

Tickets For PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL at the North Charleston Performing Arts Center Go on Sale Next Week

The Best of Broadway announced that single tickets for the upcoming engagement of PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL December 1 – 3 at the North Charleston Performing Arts Center will go on sale Monday, September 25 at 10 AM. Learn more about how to get tickets here!

Full Cast and Route Revealed for PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL North American Tour

Get all the details on the upcoming North American tour, including the full route and cast announcement. Find out when and where you can catch this highly-anticipated production in your city.

Amber Davies, Ore Oduba, Oliver Savile, and Natalie Paris Join UK Tour of PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL

Following its successful run in the West End, the producers of the smash hit PRETTY WOMAN: THE MUSICAL have announced casting for the UK and Ireland tour, opening at the Birmingham Alexandra Theatre on Tuesday 17 October 2023. Find out who's starring in the show here!

Video: Tom Holland Stars in THE CROWDED ROOM Series Trailer

The limited series is starring and executive produced by Tom Holland. Featuring an ensemble cast led by Holland, the series also stars Amanda Seyfried, Emmy Rossum, Sasha Lane, Will Chase and Lior Raz along with guest stars Jason Isaacs, Christopher Abbott, Thomas Sadoski and Zachary Golinger. Watch the video trailer now!
